entry.title: Plantilla: Friends
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html b:css='false' b:defaultwidgetversion='2' b:js='true' b:layoutsVersion='3' b:responsive='true' b:templateUrl='indie.xml' b:templateVersion='1.0.0' expr:dir='data:blog.languageDirection' expr:lang='data:blog.locale' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' xmlns:b='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/b' xmlns:data='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/data' xmlns:expr='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/expr'>
	<head>
    <!-- Meta Umum -->
	<meta expr:charset='data:blog.encoding'/>
	<meta expr:content='data:view.isHomepage ? "website" : "article"' property='og:type'/>
    <b:if cond='data:widgets.AdSense.first or data:blog.adsenseClientId'>
    <script async='async' src='//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js'/></b:if>
    <b:include data='blog' name='google-analytics'/>
	<meta content='width=device-width,initial-scale=1' name='viewport'/>
   	<meta expr:content='data:view.url.canonical' property='og:url'/>
	<link expr:href='data:view.url.canonical' rel='canonical'/>
    <!-- Meta Kata Kunci -->
    <b:if cond='data:view.isMultipleItems'>
    <meta content='South Park -  Mira Episodios Completos Gratis | South Park Studios Espa√±ola' name='keywords'/> 
    </b:if>
    <b:if cond='data:view.isSingleItem'>
    <meta expr:content='"ver south park " + data:blog.pageName + " subtile indonesia" + ",download " + data:blog.pageName + " sub indo"' name='keywords'/>
    </b:if>
	<!-- Meta Deskripsi -->
	<b:if cond='data:view.description'>
	<meta expr:content='data:view.description.escaped' property='og:description'/>
	<meta expr:content='data:view.description.escaped' name='description'/>
	</b:if>
    <!-- Meta Judul -->
	<b:if cond='data:view.isHomepage or (data:view.isSearch and !data:view.isLabelSearch and !data:blog.searchQuery)'>
    <title>South park completo <data:view.title.escaped/>South park temporadas completas</title>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:image:alt'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/>
	<b:elseif cond='data:view.isSingleItem or data:view.isSearch or data:view.isArchive'/>
    <title>Download <data:blog.pageName/> South park temporadas completas</title>
    <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/>
	<b:elseif cond='data:view.isError'/>
    <title>Page Not Found</title>
    <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/>
    <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='"Page Not Found - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/>
	<b:else/>
    <title><data:view.title/></title>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' property='og:image:alt'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:title'/>
    <meta expr:content='data:view.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/>
	</b:if>     
	<!-- Meta Featured Image -->
	<b:if cond='data:widgets'>
	<b:loop values='data:widgets.Blog.first.posts where (p => p.featuredImage) map (p => p.featuredImage)' var='imageUrl'>
	<meta expr:content='resizeImage(data:imageUrl,1200,"1200:630")' property='og:image'/>
   	</b:loop>
   	<meta content='1200' property='og:image:width'/>
   	<meta content='630' property='og:image:height'/>
	</b:if>
    <!-- Meta Robot -->
	<b:if cond='!data:view.isError or !data:view.isArchive or !data:view.isSearch'>
	<meta content='index/follow' name='robots'/>
	</b:if>
    <!-- Meta App -->
	<meta expr:content='data:blog.title' name='application-name'/>
	<meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/>
	<!-- Meta Tag Referrer -->
	<meta content='unsafe-url' name='referrer'/>
	<!-- Type of twitter card -->
	<meta content='summary_large_image' name='twitter:card'/>
	<!-- favicon -->
	<link expr:href='data:blog.blogspotFaviconUrl' rel='icon' type='image/x-icon'/>
	<!-- Feeds -->
	<b:if cond='data:blog.feedLinks'>
	<b:with value='path(data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical,"feeds/posts/default")' var='feeds'>
   	<link expr:href='data:feeds' rel='alternate' title='Atom 1.0' type='application/atom+xml'/>
   	<link expr:href='data:feeds params {alt: "rss"}' rel='alternate' title='RSS 2.0' type='application/rss+xml'/>
	</b:with>
	</b:if>
	<!-- Sitelinks Searchbox -->
	<script type='application/ld+json'>
	{
    "@context": "http://schema.org",
    "@type": "WebSite",
    "url": "<data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical/>",
    "potentialAction": {
        "@type": "SearchAction",
        "target": "<data:blog.searchUrl/>?q={search_term_string}",
        "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"}}
	</script>
    <b:skin><![CDATA[  
/** <!-- Variable definitions -->
<Group description="Komentar Baru Blogger (Contempo, Soho, Emporio, Notable)">
 <Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="#dddfe2" default="#dddfe2 none repeat scroll top left" value="#dddfe2 none repeat scroll top left"/>
 <Variable name="body.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif" value="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"/>

 <Variable name="body.text.font" description="1"
  type="font"
  default="$(body.font)" value="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"/>
 <Variable name="posts.background.color" description="2"
  type="color"
  default="#fff" value="#fbfbfb"/>
 <Variable name="body.link.color" description="3"
  type="color"
  default="#663399" value="#3577ff"/>
 <Variable name="body.link.visited.color" description="4"
  type="color"
  default="#663399" value="#663399"/>
 <Variable name="body.link.hover.color" description="5"
  type="color"
  default="#1d2129" value="#1d2129"/>
 <Variable name="blog.title.font" description="6"
  type="font"
  default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"/>
 <Variable name="blog.title.color" description="7"
  type="color"
  default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
 <Variable name="header.icons.color" description="8"
  type="color"
  default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
 <Variable name="tabs.font" description="9"
  type="font"
  default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"/>
 <Variable name="tabs.color" description="10"
  type="color"
  default="#ccc" value="#cccccc"/>
 <Variable name="tabs.selected.color" description="11"
  type="color"
  default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
 <Variable name="tabs.overflow.background.color" description="12"
  type="color"
  default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
 <Variable name="tabs.overflow.color" description="13"
  type="color"
  default="$(body.text.color)" value="#1d2129"/>
 <Variable name="tabs.overflow.selected.color" description="14"
  type="color"
  default="$(body.text.color)" value="#1d2129"/>
 <Variable name="posts.title.color" description="15"
  type="color"
  default="$(body.text.color)" value="#1d2129"/>
 <Variable name="posts.title.font" description="16"
  type="font"
  default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"/>
 <Variable name="posts.text.font" description="17"
  type="font"
  default="$(body.text.font)" value="normal 400 14px Roboto, Arial, sans-serif"/>
 <Variable name="posts.text.color" description="18"
  type="color"
  default="$(body.text.color)" value="#1d2129"/>
 <Variable name="posts.icons.color" description="19"
  type="color"
  default="$(body.text.color)" value="#1d2129"/>
 <Variable name="labels.background.color" description="20"
  type="color"
  default="#292e34" value="#292e34"/>
</Group> */

.ff {font-family: Overpass,-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,Fira Sans,Droid Sans,Helvetica Neue,sans-serif}
a {color: rgb(133,150,165);text-decoration: none}

.grid,.related-posts-4 {display: grid}
.flex,.continue {display: flex}

.fr,.datetime {float: right}
.none,.blog-author::before,.comment-replies .comment-replies,.thread-toggle,.comment-actions.secondary-text,#top-continue,.related-posts-container h4,#menu-btn, .episode [data^="Winter"],.episode [data^="Summer"],.episode [data^="Fall"],.episode [data^="Spring"],.musim [data^="Episode"],.episode .divider{display: none}

.divider:last-child {display: none}

.hfeed {grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill,minmax(150px,1fr));justify-content: center}

.item.list {display: grid;grid-gap: 24px}
.item.list.lbs,.item.list {grid-template-columns: 1fr}
.list .grid-list {display: grid}

.list .box-sh, .thumb .box-sh {box-shadow: 0 14px 30px rgba(103,132,187,.15),0 4px 4px rgba(103,132,187,.05)}

.thumb .grid-th {display: grid}
.thumb .relative-th,.cover .relative-th,.relative-th {position: relative}

.thumb .absolute-th,.cover .absolute-th,.absolute-th {position: absolute}
.thumb .bg-overlay,.cover .bg-overlay,.bg-overlay {background: rgba(31,38,49,.9)}
.thumb .w-calc24,.cover .w-calc24,.w-calc24 {width: calc(100% - 24px)}
.thumb .p-12,.cover .p-12,.p-12 {padding: 12px}

.cover.def,.def {display: grid;grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit,minmax(150px,1fr));grid-gap: 30px}
.cover .dn-c,.dn-c {display:none}
.cover .r4-c,.r4-c {border-radius: 4px}
.cover .oh-c,.oh-c {overflow: hidden}
.cover .w-full-c,.w-full-c {width: 100%}

.fv .cover .c-blue-c {color: rgb(61,180,242)}
.cover .divider,.list .divider,.def .divider {display: none}

.theme .text{text-transform:uppercase;font-size:.7rem;font-weight:600;padding:5px 0}
.theme .switch{position:relative;display:flex;width:30px;height:15px;margin:0 5px 0 10px;align-items: center}
.theme .switch input{display:none}
.theme .geser {background-color: #3577ff;position: absolute !important;outline: 0;width: 40px;height: 10px;padding: 0 !important;cursor: pointer;border-radius: 100px;transition: all .3s ease;user-select: none}
.theme .geser::before {position: absolute;content: "";height: 24px;width: 24px;left: 0;top: -7px;transition: .4s}
.theme input:checked+.geser{background-color:#748899}
.theme input:focus+.geser{box-shadow:0 0 1px #000}
.theme input:checked+.geser:before{transform:translateX(17px)}
.theme .geser.round{border-radius:34px}

.preloader {position: fixed;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 100%;z-index: 9999;background-color: #e5ebf1}
.preloader .loading {position: absolute;left: 50%;top: 50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);font: 14px arial}
.loader,.loader:after {border-radius: 50%;width: 4em;height: 4em}
.loader {margin: 60px auto;font-size: 5px;position: relative;text-indent: -9999em;border-top: 1.1em solid rgba(8,150,230, 0.2);border-right: 1.1em solid rgba(8,150,230, 0.2);border-bottom: 1.1em solid rgba(8,150,230, 0.2);border-left: 1.1em solid #0896e6;-webkit-transform: translateZ(0);-ms-transform: translateZ(0);transform: translateZ(0);-webkit-animation: load8 1.1s infinite linear;animation: load8 1.1s infinite linear}
@-webkit-keyframes load8 {0% {-webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);transform: rotate(0deg);}100% {-webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);transform: rotate(360deg);}}
@keyframes load8 {0% {-webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);transform: rotate(0deg);}100% {-webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);transform: rotate(360deg);}}

.list-entries h3 {padding-left: 15px;padding-right: 15px;font-size: 15px;background: #E0E0E0;padding-top: 5px;padding-bottom: 5px;margin: 0;font-weight: normal}
.list-entries ul {list-style: none;padding: 0 10px;margin: 0}
.list-entries {font-size: .9rem;}
.list-entries a {flex: 2;text-align: center}
.list-entries p {flex: 1;margin: 0;padding: 3px 5px;background: #f3f3f3;justify-content: center}
.dark .list-entries p {color: rgb(159,173,189);background: #33373e;}
.dark .list-entries h3 {color: white;background: #454d5b;}
@media (max-width: 460px){.list-entries li{display: flex;flex-direction: column}
.list-entries a{padding: 10px}
.list-entries p{text-align: center}}
@media (min-width: 460px){
.list-entries p {display: inline-flex}
.list-entries li {display: flex;align-items: center}}
.batch li {display: flex;align-items: center;justify-content: space-between;margin-right: 15px;margin-left: 15px;}
.batch ul {padding: 0;list-style: none;font-size: .9rem}
.batch a {padding: 5px 10px;background: rgb(116,136,153);border-radius: 3px;color: white}
.batch a:hover {filter: hue-rotate(50deg)}

    <b:includable id='main' var='this'>
   <b:class cond='data:view.isPage' name='pl-50 pr-50'/>
   <b:include cond='data:view.isMultipleItems' name='viewToggle'/>
   <div class='blog-posts'>
   <b:class cond='data:view.isMultipleItems' name='item def app-pl-20 app-pr-20'/>
   <b:class cond='data:view.isLabelSearch' name='lbs'/>
     
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:posts' var='post'>
      <b:include data='post' name='postCommentsAndAd'/>
    </b:loop>
     <b:include cond='data:view.isLabelSearch' name='postMetaCat'/>
   </div>
  <b:include cond='data:view.isMultipleItems' name='NextPrev'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='DbEpisode'>
    <b:with value='["Action","Adventure","Comedy","Drama","Ecchi","Fantasy","Harem","Historical","Horror","Isekai","Magic","Mecha","Mystery","Psychological","Reincarnation","Romance","Samurai","School Life","Sci-Fi","Seinen","Shounen","Slice of Life","Sport","Supernatural","Thriller","Music","Demon","Game","Vampire","Military","Ongoing","Tamat","BD","OVA","ONA","TV","Movie","Shoujo Ai","Shounen Ai"]' var='filter'>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
      <b:if cond='data:label.name not in data:filter'>
      <a class='c-blue-c c-g800 c-114' expr:data='data:label.name' expr:href='data:post.url' rel='tag'>
        <data:label.name/>
      </a>
        <span class='divider'>/</span> 
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>
    </b:with>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='DbFormat'>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
      <b:if cond='data:label.name in ["TV", "BD", "OVA", "ONA", "Movie", "Web Dl"]'>
      <a expr:data='data:label.name' expr:href='data:label.url' rel='tag'>
      <data:label.name/>
      </a>
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='DbGenre'>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
      <b:if cond='data:label.name in ["Action", "Adventure", "Comedy", "Drama", "Ecchi", "Fantasy", "Harem", "Historical", "Horror", "Isekai", "Magic", "Martial Arts", "Mecha", "Mystery", "Psychological", "Reincarnation", "Romance", "Samurai", "School Life", "Sci-Fi", "Seinen", "Shounen", "Slice of Life", "Sport", "Supernatural", "Thriller", "Music", "Demon", "Game", "Vampire", "Military"]'>
      <a class='c-g800 c-114' expr:href='data:label.url' rel='tag'>
      <data:label.name/>
      </a>
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>    
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='DbMusim'>
    <b:with value='["Action", "Adventure", "Comedy", "Drama", "Ecchi", "Fantasy", "Harem", "Historical", "Horror", "Isekai", "Magic", "Mecha", "Mystery", "Psychological", "Reincarnation", "Romance", "Samurai", "School Life", "Sci-Fi", "Seinen", "Shounen", "Slice of Life", "Sport", "Supernatural", "Thriller", "Music", "Demon", "Game", "Vampire", "Military", "Ongoing", "Tamat", "BD", "OVA", "ONA", "TV", "Movie", "Shoujo Ai", "Shounen Ai"]' var='filter'>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
      <b:if cond='data:label.name not in data:filter'>
      <a class='c-g800 c-114' expr:data='data:label.name' expr:href='data:label.url' rel='tag'>
      <data:label.name/>
      </a>
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>    
    </b:with>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='DbStatus'>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
      <b:if cond='data:label.name in ["Tamat", "Ongoing"]'>
      <a class='c-g800 c-114' expr:href='data:label.url' rel='tag'>
      <data:label.name/>
      </a>
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>    
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='NextPrev'>
  <div class='blog-pager c-g900' id='blog-pagerx'>
    <b:if cond='data:olderPageUrl'>
      <span id='blog-pager-older-link'>
      <a class='blog-pager-older-link' expr:href='data:olderPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-older-link"' expr:title='data:olderPageTitle'><svg style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M2 12C2 16.97 6.03 21 11 21C13.39 21 15.68 20.06 17.4 18.4L15.9 16.9C14.63 18.25 12.86 19 11 19C4.76 19 1.64 11.46 6.05 7.05C10.46 2.64 18 5.77 18 12H15L19 16H19.1L23 12H20C20 7.03 15.97 3 11 3C6.03 3 2 7.03 2 12Z' fill='currentColor'/>
</svg></a>
      </span>
    </b:if>
  </div>

    <b:includable id='aboutPostAuthor'>
  <div class='author-name'>
    <a class='g-profile' expr:href='data:post.author.profileUrl' rel='author' title='author profile'>
      <span>
        <data:post.author.name/>
      </span>
    </a>
  </div>
  <div>
    <span class='author-desc'>
      <data:post.author.aboutMe/>

    <b:includable id='addComments'>

    <b:message name='messages.postAComment'/>
  </a>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='autoKeyword'>
    <p>Download <data:blog.pageName/> subtitle Indonesia. Download <data:blog.pageName/> sub indo.</p>

    <b:includable id='blogThisShare'>
  <b:with value='"window.open(this.href, \"_blank\", \"height=270,width=475\"); return false;"' var='onclick'>
    <b:include name='platformShare'/>
  </b:with>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='bylineByName' var='byline'>
  <b:switch var='data:byline.name'>
  <b:case value='share'/>
    <b:include cond='data:post.shareUrl' name='postShareButtons'/>
  <b:case value='comments'/>
    <b:include cond='data:post.allowComments' name='postCommentsLink'/>
  <b:case value='location'/>
    <b:include cond='data:post.location' name='postLocation'/>
  <b:case value='timestamp'/>
    <b:include cond='not data:view.isPage' name='postTimestamp'/>
  <b:case value='author'/>
    <b:include name='postAuthor'/>
  <b:case value='labels'/>
    <b:include cond='data:post.labels' name='postLabels'/>
  <b:case value='icons'/>
    <b:include cond='data:post.emailPostUrl' name='emailPostIcon'/>
  <b:case value='reactions'/>
    <b:include cond='data:post.reactionsUrl' name='postReactions'/>
  </b:switch>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='bylineRegion' var='regionItems'>
  <b:loop values='data:regionItems' var='byline'>
    <b:include data='byline' name='bylineByName'/>
  </b:loop>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='chapterHomeFeed'>
      <div class='grid gtcr-48a60a r3 oh box-3 bsn bg-100 bc-213'>
      <b:with value='data:post.thumbnailUrl ? resizeImage(data:post.thumbnailUrl, 200, "1:2") : data:post.thumbnail' var='thumb'>
    <a expr:href='data:post.link ?: data:post.url'>
            <img class='h-100p ofc w-100p' expr:src='data:thumb'/>
          </a>
  </b:with>
        <div class='oh toe flex flex-col jc-sb p-10l fs-09'>
     <b:if cond='data:post.link or (data:post.url and data:view.url != data:post.url)'>
        <a class='c-g900 wsn fs-09 c-159 mb-10 mt-10' expr:data='data:label.name' expr:href='data:post.link ?: data:post.url'><data:post.title/></a>
      <b:else/>
        <data:post.title/>
      </b:if>
          <div class='flex item-center fs-09'>       
            <b:include name='DbFormat'/> <span class='mr-5 ml-5'>/</span> <b:include name='DbEpisode'/>         
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentAuthorAvatar'>
  <div class='avatar-image-container'>
    <img class='author-avatar' expr:src='data:comment.authorAvatarSrc' height='35' width='35'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentDeleteIcon' var='comment'>
  <span expr:class='"item-control " + data:comment.adminClass'>
    <b:if cond='data:showCmtPopup'>
      <div class='goog-toggle-button'>
        <div class='goog-inline-block comment-action-icon'/>
      </div>
    <b:else/>
      <a class='comment-delete' expr:href='data:comment.deleteUrl' expr:title='data:messages.deleteComment'>
        <img src='https://resources.blogblog.com/img/icon_delete13.gif'/>
      </a>
    </b:if>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentForm' var='post'>
  <div class='comment-form'>
    <a name='comment-form'/>

    <b:if cond='data:this.messages.blogComment != ""'>
      <p class='r4 p-20 bi-blue box-3 c-white'><data:this.messages.blogComment/></p>
    </b:if>
    <b:include data='post' name='commentFormIframeSrc'/>
    <iframe allowtransparency='allowtransparency' class='blogger-iframe-colorize blogger-comment-from-post' expr:height='data:cmtIframeInitialHeight ?: "90px"' frameborder='0' id='comment-editor' name='comment-editor' src='' width='100%'/>
    <data:post.cmtfpIframe/>
    <script type='text/javascript'>
      BLOG_CMT_createIframe('<data:post.appRpcRelayPath/>');
    </script>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentFormIframeSrc' var='post'>
  <a expr:href='data:post.commentFormIframeSrc appendParams {skin: "contempo"}' id='comment-editor-src'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentItem' var='comment'>
  <div class='comment' expr:id='"c" + data:comment.id'>
    <b:include cond='data:blog.enabledCommentProfileImages' name='commentAuthorAvatar'/>

    <div class='comment-block'>
      <div class='comment-author'>
        <b:if cond='data:comment.authorUrl'>
          <b:message name='messages.authorSaidWithLink'>
            <b:param expr:value='data:comment.author' name='authorName'/>
            <b:param expr:value='data:comment.authorUrl' name='authorUrl'/>
          </b:message>
        <b:else/>
          <b:message name='messages.authorSaid'>
            <b:param expr:value='data:comment.author' name='authorName'/>
          </b:message>
        </b:if>
      </div>
      <div expr:class='"comment-body" + (data:comment.isDeleted ? " deleted" : "")'>
        <data:comment.body/>
      </div>
      <div class='comment-footer'>
        <span class='comment-timestamp'>
          <a expr:href='data:comment.url' title='comment permalink'>
            <data:comment.timestamp/>
          </a>
          <b:include data='comment' name='commentDeleteIcon'/>
        </span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentList' var='comments'>
  <div id='comments-block'>
    <b:loop values='data:comments' var='comment'>
      <b:include data='comment' name='commentItem'/>
    </b:loop>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentPicker' var='post'>
  <b:if cond='data:post.showThreadedComments'>
    <b:include data='post' name='threadedComments'/>
  <b:else/>
    <b:include data='post' name='comments'/>
  </b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='comments' var='post'>
<div>
  <div class='tab-content current' id='tab-1'>
    <b:include name='downloadList'/>
  <section expr:class='"comments" + (data:post.embedCommentForm ? " embed" : "")' expr:data-num-comments='data:post.numberOfComments' id='comments'>
    <a name='comments'/>
    <b:if cond='data:post.allowComments'>
      <div expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_comments-block-wrapper"'>
        <b:include cond='data:post.comments' data='post.comments' name='commentList'/>
      </div>

      <b:if cond='data:post.commentPagingRequired'>
        <div class='paging-control-container'>
          <b:if cond='data:post.hasOlderLinks'>
            <a expr:class='data:post.oldLinkClass' expr:href='data:post.oldestLinkUrl'>
              <data:messages.oldest/>
            </a>
            <a expr:class='data:post.oldLinkClass' expr:href='data:post.olderLinkUrl'>
              <data:messages.older/>
            </a>
          </b:if>

          <span class='comment-range-text'>
            <data:post.commentRangeText/>
          </span>

          <b:if cond='data:post.hasNewerLinks'>
            <a expr:class='data:post.newLinkClass' expr:href='data:post.newerLinkUrl'>
              <data:messages.newer/>
            </a>
            <a expr:class='data:post.newLinkClass' expr:href='data:post.newestLinkUrl'>
              <data:messages.newest/>
            </a>
          </b:if>
        </div>
      </b:if>

      <div class='footer'>
        <b:if cond='data:post.embedCommentForm'>
          <b:if cond='data:post.allowNewComments'>
            <b:include data='post' name='commentForm'/>
          <b:else/>
            <data:post.noNewCommentsText/>
          </b:if>
        <b:else/>
          <b:if cond='data:post.allowComments'>
            <b:include data='post' name='addComments'/>
          </b:if>
        </b:if>
      </div>
    </b:if>
    <b:if cond='data:showCmtPopup'>
      <div id='comment-popup'>
        <iframe allowtransparency='allowtransparency' frameborder='0' id='comment-actions' name='comment-actions' scrolling='no'>
        </iframe>
      </div>
    </b:if>
  </section>
  </div>
 	<b:include name='tabNav'/>
      </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='commentsLink'>
  <a class='comment-link' expr:href='data:post.commentsUrl' expr:onclick='data:post.commentsUrlOnclick'>
    <b:if cond='data:post.numberOfComments > 0'>
      <b:message name='messages.numberOfComments'>
        <b:param expr:value='data:post.numberOfComments' name='numComments'/>
      </b:message>
    <b:else/>
      <data:messages.postAComment/>
    </b:if>
  </a>
</b:includable>

</b:includable>

    <b:includable id='feedLinks'>
  <b:if cond='!data:view.isPost'> <!-- Blog feed links -->
    <b:if cond='data:feedLinks'>
      <div class='blog-feeds'>
        <b:include data='feedLinks' name='feedLinksBody'/>
      </div>
    </b:if>
  <b:else/> <!--Post feed links -->
    <div class='post-feeds'>

    <b:includable id='footerBylines'>
  <b:if cond='data:widgets.Blog.first.footerBylines'>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:widgets.Blog.first.footerBylines' var='region'>
      <b:if cond='not data:region.items.empty'>
        <div expr:class='"post-footer-line post-footer-line-" + (data:i + 1)'>
          <b:with value='"footer-" + (data:i + 1)' var='regionName'>

          </b:with>
        </div>
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>
  </b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='genreInfo'>
      <b:if cond='data:view.isLabelSearch'>
        <b:if cond='data:view.search.label in ["Action"]'>
Apa itu Genre anime Action? – Paling dicari, paling populer, dan paling banyak disukai para penonton, Genre Action adalah kategori yang menentukan aksi keren setiap cuplikan dari sebuah seri anime, entah itu aksi pertarungan ataupun aksi di sebuah peperangan. Dan berikut rekomendasi anime Action terbaik.
        <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Romance"]'/>
Berbalik dengan Action, Genre Romance adalah kategori yang berarti bahwa anime tersebut akan menceritakan tentang kisah percintaan di Sekolah, ataupun kisah percintaan yang terbalut Drama ataupun terkait dengan Action. Oh iya! Drama percintaan yang ada di dalam anime biasanya akan sangat menguras emosi, karena akan kamu menangis karena sedih, terharu, ketawa, bahkan senyum-senyum sendiri. Berikut rekomendasi anime Romance terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Comedy"]'/>
Genre berikut ini juga sering dikolaborasikan menjadi satu dengan Genre Action maupun Romance. Genre ini akan membuat kamu ketawa-ketiwi geli sendiri karena Komedi merupakan genre anime yang berfokus pada satu tujuan yaitu untuk menghibur penonton dengan tingkah lucu-lucu karakter dari anime. Berikut rekomendasi anime Comedy terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Adventure"]'/>
Genre bernama Adventure biasanya berkaitan erat dengan Genre Action, Genre Adventure adalah kategori anime yang akan menceritakan tentang petualangan seseorang dalam menjelajah maupun menempuh perjalanan ke suatu tempat. Bisa juga menceritakan tentang perjalanan hidupnya melewati berbagai peristiwa dan kejadian. Kita sebagai penonton bisa melihat banyak latar tempat dan cenderung memiliki karakter yang banyak sehingga tidak akan bosan jika ditonton berulang kali (Rewatch). Berikut rekomendasi anime Adventure terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Drama"]'/>
Nah, sudah saya katakan sebelumnya bahwa Drama biasanya erat kaitan dengan Romance. Dan kalau diibaratkan, Drama itu mirip seperti Adventure dimana dalam cerita akan diperlihatkan perjalanan kisah demi kisah seorang karakter bukan hanya berfokus pada karakter utama. Mirip juga dengan Romance, Drama biasanya akan menguji emosi kamu seperti kisah seorang karakter yang menyedihkan atau bikin filu. Berikut rekomendasi anime Drama terbaik.
        <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Slice of Life"]'/>
Maksud dari kategori Slice of Life adalah dimana anime itu akan menceritakan tentang keseharian seorang karakter dan hanya akan terus berfokus pada karakter itu, seperti contoh anime yang hanya menceritakan tentang kehidupan seorang karakter utama di dunia kerja dan sekolah. Berikut 10 rekomendasi anime Slice of Life terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Fantasy"]'/>
Mungkin sudah terbayang di Benak kamu bahwa Genre Fantasy adalah perwujudan anime yang menceritakan kehidupan manusia yang dikelilingi sihir, mahluk astral, dan pokoknya tidak kita temukan di dunia nyata secara Realis. Di dalam anime kategori Fantasy, biasanya akan memperlihatkan cerita karakter yang dunianya ditemani hal-hal Fantasi seperti Naga, karakter yang bisa terbang, tongkat sihir, atau bahkan sebuah robot canggih. Berikut rekomendasi anime Fantasy terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Supernatural"]'/>
Sangat dekat dengan Fantasy, biasanya kategori anime Supernatural akan menceritakan tentang seorang karakter yang entah dari lahir atau mendapatkan keajaiban dimana ia bisa menggunakan sebuah kemampuan/kekuatan super dengan bumbu sihir, namun dalam Logika Supernatural pernah terjadi dalam dunia nyata. Berikut rekomendasi anime Supernatural terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Horror"]'/>
Kamu suka dengan tontonan dimana itu akan memperlihatkan penampakan atau momen kejutan yang mungkin akan membuat kamu langsung berteriak Histeris? nah itu adalah kategori Genre Horor. Anime Horor adalah anime-anime yang berisikan cerita tentang kisah mengerikan seseorang seperti ia sedang berada di alam lain atau bahkan tentang cerita pembunuhan dengan bagian-bagian mengerikan yaitu Gore dan Jumpscare. Berikut rekomendasi anime horor terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Thriller"]'/>
Kisah tegang. Biasanya disertai dengan alur cerita yang rumit, berbahaya, tidak diduga, yang membuat kita penasaran apa yang akan terjadi berikutnya.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Mystery"]'/>
Nah, mirip dan sering berkaitan dengan Genre Horor, Genre Mystery adalah kategori anime-anime yang menceritakan tentang pemecahan masalah/pemecahan kasus yang sebelumnya belum jelas dan terungkap dan sangat erat kaitannya dengan Detektif. Berikut rekomendasi anime Mystery terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Psychological"]'/>
Cukup rumit namun seru, Genre Psychological adalah kategori anime yang menceritakan tentang karakter anime yang mengalami semacam gangguan jiwa atau cerita yang bisa membuat mental penonton menjadi terganggu, meski semua itu jarang terjadi tergantung tingkat Psychological anime tersebut dan keadaan mental si penonton. Berikut rekomendasi anime Psychological terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Sci-Fi"]'/>
Genre Sci-Fi atau yang memiliki sinonim yaitu fiksi ilmiah adalah kategori anime yang menceritakan tentang dimana karakter anime sudah berada di dunia masa depan dengan semua yang telah menjadi canggih seperti mobil yang sudah bisa terbang, robot canggih, ataupun senjata laser dan super mematikan. Berikut rekomendasi anime Sci-Fi terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Samurai"]'/>
Samurai adalah mereka yang mengikuti bushido, yaitu cara hidup prajurit Jepang klasik. Fokus genre ini pada tokoh utama yang memakai pedang samurai atau cara hidup seperti samurai. Kalau disertai genre action maka sang tokoh utamanya bertempur dengan pedang samurai.          
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Reincarnation"]'/>
Reinkarnasi adalah konsep tentang seseorang yang melanjutkan hidupnya atau terlahir kembali setelah mati yang masih dalam satu universe. Berbeda dengan isekai yang pemain utamanya pindah ke dunia lain / paralel universe.      
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Mecha"]'/>
Sudah jelas dari terjemahan saja, arti Mecha itu adalah Robot. Genre Mecha adalah kategori anime yang menceritakan tentang Robot. Tapi bukan berarti manusianya yang menjadi Robot, namun yang mereka tumpangi adalah Robot.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Harem"]'/>
Untuk yang satu ini, sering kali dijadikan sebagai bumbu pemanis dalam seri anime namun sering disalah artikan oleh beberapa orang dan menganggap anime Genre Harem adalah anime mesum dengan adegan Porn*, padahal tidak. Genre Harem adalah anime dengan kategori yang menceritakan tentang laki-laki/cowok yang dikelilingi banyak wanita cantik. Berikut rekomendasi anime Harem terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Isekai"]'/>
Genre Isekai adalah Genre anime yang menceritakan tentang kisah karakter utama yang biasanya berasal dari dunia manusia/nyata berpindah ke dunia Fantasy yang penuh dengan hal-hal aneh seperti dunia para penyihir dan bahkan ada dunia isekai Virtual Game. Berikut rekomendasi anime Isekai terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Game"]'/>
Seperti bermain Game, Genre satu ini adalah kategori anime yang menceritakan tentang berbagai macam permainan dan kadang sangat mengerikan seperti Game kematian, atau manusia menjadikan manusia sebagai bagian dari Game. Berikut rekomendasi anime Game terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Ecchi"]'/>
Memerlukan batas usia yang harus kalian pahami! untuk menonton anime dengan kategori Genre Ecchi, kalian harus sudah berusia 18 tahun keatas ya! karena anime Ecchi adalah anime yang berisikan bagian-bagian panas seperti karakter yang hanya mengenakan bikini sebagai kostum tetapnya. Berikut rekomendasi anime Ecchi terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Historical"]'/>
Historical adalah kategori anime yang menceritakan tentang hal yang berkaitan erat dengan sejarah, biasanya seperti anime yang berlatar di-masa lalu jauh seperti jaman perang atau jaman Edo di Jepang.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Martial Arts"]'/>
Suka dengan silat, atau seni bela diri yang ditampilkan lewat anime? Martial Art adalah kategori untuk anime yang menceritakan seni bela diri baik itu menggunakan tangan kosong atau menggunakan senjata dan cenderung tidak terkait dengan ilmu Supernatural dan Magic.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Music"]'/>
Suka Idol? suka liat perjuangan karakter anime dalam menempuh perjalanan menjadi penyanyi terbaik, atau bahkan suka anime-anime yang menceritakan tentang perjalanan Band Musik? Genre Music adalah kategori anime yang membawakan alur cerita dengan iringan musik yang khas dan hanya ditemukan dari anime itu saja.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["School Life"]'/>
Sesuai dengan namanya, Genre School adalah kategori anime yang menceritakan tentang kehidupan anak-anak muda dalam menempuh pendidikan sekolah yang juga biasanya terkait dengan Genre lain seperti Drama dan Romance.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Supernatural"]'/>
Berkaitan erat dengan Supernatural, anime kategori Super Power adalah anime-anime yang menceritakan tentang seorang karakter utama yang mendapatkan kekuatan hebat gabungan antara Supernatural dan kekuatan fisik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Shounen"]'/>
Unik dan sangat berbeda dengan Genre lainnya, Genre Shounen adalah anime-anime yang dikategorikan masih wajar untuk ditonton pada batas usia remaja laki-laki, misalnya bagian kekerasan yang diminimalisir dan aman dari adegan dewasa antara cowok dan cewek.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Shoujo"]'/>
Sama halnya dengan Shounen, Shoujo adal anime-anime yang dikategorikan masih wajar dengan batas-batas tertentu namun untuk remaja cewek/perempuan. Biasanya anime-anime Shoujo itu seperti anime yang menceritakan tentang Drama persahabatan atau momen-momen terkesan terhadap cowok ganteng.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Seinen"]'/>
Berkebalikan dengan Shounen, kategori anime Seinen adalah anime-anime yang menceritakan tentang kisah cerita yang sudah pantas ditonton oleh orang-orang dewasa alias sudah mencukupi umur untuk menontonnya.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Sport"]'/>
Apa itu Genre anime Sports? – Intinya, Genre Sports adalah kategori untuk anime-anime yang menceritakan tentang kehidupan yang selalu mengutamakan Olahraga, entah itu perjuangan untuk menjadi atlet terbaik dan semacamnya.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Vampire"]'/>
Sudah dipastikan, Genre Vampire akan selalu berkolaborasi dengan Genre Action. Vampire adalah makhluk penghisap darah yang sangat terkenal legenda-nya di abad pertengahan. Namun di anime, karakter Vampire banyak di Modifikasi menjadi karakter yang bisa berbaur dengan manusia dan bahkan memiliki insting dan kehidupan seperti layaknya manusia, bahkan ada karakter anime Vampire yang lugu.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Demon"]'/>
Mirip seperti Vampire, Genre Demons adalah kategori anime yang ceritanya berisikan mahluk-mahluk seperti Monster dan Iblis. Berikut 12+ rekomendasi anime Demons terbaik.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Magic"]'/>
Mirip dengan Genre Fantasy, genre Magic adalah kategori anime yang akan menceritakan bahwa anime itu hanya akan berfokus pada hal-hal sihir dan bahkan anime yang menceritakan dunia dimana dunia yang penuh dengan penyihir dan berbagai ilmu sihirnya.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Military"]'/>
Terkait dengan Genre Police, Military adalah Genre anime yang menceritakan tentang perang yang orang-orangnya adalah tentara Militer dengan pasukan yang banyak, senjata, dan tank. Biasanya juga Genre Military menceritakan tentang pertarungan antara 2 pihak.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Manga"]'/>
komik dari Jepang. Biasanya dibuka dari kiri ke kanan, dibacanya dari kanan atas ke kiri atas lalu kanan bawah ke kiri bawah. Jadi pola bacanya seperti huruf Z tapi terbalik diagonalnya. Biasanya manga terbit dalam edisi hitam putih tapi tidak jarang juga ada manga yang terbit dengan warna, entah itu pada halaman cover saja atau seluruh manganya penuh warna.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Manhua"]'/>
komik dari Cina. Biasanya dibuka dari kanan ke kiri (seperti komik/buku di Indonesia pada umumnya) dan dibaca dari kiri atas ke kanan atas lalu kiri bawah ke kanan bawah. Pola bacanya seperti huruf Z. Biasanya cerita dari Manhua lebih berwarna. Entahlah mengapa. Mungkin karena pembuatnya sangat rajin atau punya banyak staff yang bisa memberikan warna.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Manhwa"]'/>
komik dari Korea. Cara baca, cara membuka dan warnanya sama seperti Manhua. Contoh paling mudahnya adalah beberapa komik di Line Webtoon seperti Lookism, Dice.
          <b:elseif cond='data:view.search.label in ["Winter 2020","Spring 2020","Summer 2020","Fall 2020","Winter 2021","Spring 2021","Summer 2021","Fall 2021","Winter 2022","Spring 2022","Summer 2022","Fall 2022"]'/>
Download anime <data:blog.pageName/> sub indo. Daftar Anime <data:blog.pageName/> lengkap dengan sinopsis.
        <b:else/>
         Tidak ada deskripsi untuk katagori ini.
        </b:if>
      </b:if>
      </b:includable>

    <b:includable id='navPostLeft'>
      <b:if cond='data:olderPageUrl'>

          <a class='pt-15 pr-15 pb-15 flex' expr:href='data:olderPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-older-link"' expr:title='data:olderPageTitle'><svg style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M15.41,16.58L10.83,12L15.41,7.41L14,6L8,12L14,18L15.41,16.58Z' fill='currentColor'/>
</svg></a><b:else/><span class='pt-15 pr-15 pb-15 flex'>
<svg style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M15.41,16.58L10.83,12L15.41,7.41L14,6L8,12L14,18L15.41,16.58Z' fill='currentColor'/>
        </svg></span>
      </b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='navPostRight'>
      <b:if cond='data:newerPageUrl'>

          <a class='pt-15 pb-15 pl-15 flex' expr:href='data:newerPageUrl' expr:id='data:widget.instanceId + "_blog-pager-newer-link"' expr:title='data:newerPageTitle'><svg style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M8.59,16.58L13.17,12L8.59,7.41L10,6L16,12L10,18L8.59,16.58Z' fill='currentColor'/>
</svg></a><b:else/><span class='pt-15 pb-15 pl-15 flex'>
<svg style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M8.59,16.58L13.17,12L8.59,7.41L10,6L16,12L10,18L8.59,16.58Z' fill='currentColor'/>
        </svg></span>
      </b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='nextPageLink'>
  
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='otherSharingButton'>
  <span class='sharing-platform-button sharing-element-other' expr:aria-label='data:messages.shareToOtherApps.escaped' expr:data-url='data:originalUrl' expr:title='data:messages.shareToOtherApps.escaped' role='menuitem' tabindex='-1'>
    <b:with value='{key: "sharingOther"}' var='platform'>
      <b:include name='sharingPlatformIcon'/>
    </b:with>
    <span class='platform-sharing-text'><data:messages.shareOtherApps.escaped/></span>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='platformShare'>
  <a expr:class='"goog-inline-block sharing-" + data:platform.key' expr:data-url='data:originalUrl' expr:href='data:shareUrl + "&target=" + data:platform.target' expr:onclick='data:onclick ? data:onclick : ""' expr:title='data:platform.shareMessage' target='_blank'>
    <span class='share-button-link-text'>
      <data:platform.shareMessage/>
    </span>
  </a>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='post' var='post'>
    <b:include data='post' name='postMeta'/>
    <b:include data='post' name='postTitle'/>
    <b:if cond='data:view.isSingleItem'>
      <b:include data='post' name='postBody'/>
    <b:else/>
      <b:include data='post' name='postBodySnippet'/>
      <b:include data='post' name='postJumpLink'/>
    </b:if>

</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postAuthor'>
  <span class='byline post-author vcard'>
    <span class='post-author-label'>
      <data:byline.label/>
    </span>
    <span class='fn'>
      <b:if cond='data:post.author.profileUrl'>
        <meta expr:content='data:post.author.profileUrl'/>
        <a class='g-profile' expr:href='data:post.author.profileUrl' rel='author' title='author profile'>
          <span><data:post.author.name/></span>
        </a>
      <b:else/>
        <span><data:post.author.name/></span>
      </b:if>
    </span>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postBody' var='post'>
  <!-- If metaDescription is empty, use the post body as the schema.org description too, for G+/FB snippeting. -->
  <div class='lh-2 ga-3' expr:id='data:post.id'>
    <b:class cond='data:view.isPost' name='vh r4-br min-h200 fs-09 flex flex-col c-114'/>
    <b:class cond='data:view.isPage' name='bg-100 r4 p-25 bc-213 c-114'/>
    <b:if cond='data:view.isPage'><div class='r3i flex item-center mb-25'>
      <div class='flex item-center'>
      <b:include data='{image: data:post.author.authorPhoto.image,imageRatio: "1:1", imageSizes: [84, 168],sourceSizes: "35px",imageClass: "mr-16"}' name='responsiveImage'/><data:post.author.name/></div><time class='ml-a c-lighter fs-09'><data:post.lastUpdated.jsonEscaped/></time>
      </div></b:if>
    <data:post.body/>
    <b:include name='postMetaBreadcrumb'/>
	<b:include cond='data:view.isPost' name='postBottomNav'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postBodySnippet' var='post'>
  <b:include data='post' name='postBody'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postBottomNav'>
    <div class='flex jc-sb mt-a tabs'>
		<b:include name='navPostLeft'/>
		<a class='tab-link current p-15 cp flex item-center' data-tab='tab-1'>
          <svg class='mr-8' style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M5,20H19V18H5M19,9H15V3H9V9H5L12,16L19,9Z' fill='currentColor'/>
</svg><span class='sm-none'>Download</span></a>
		<a class='tab-link p-15 cp flex item-center' data-tab='tab-3'>
          <svg class='mr-8' style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M12,21.35L10.55,20.03C5.4,15.36 2,12.27 2,8.5C2,5.41 4.42,3 7.5,3C9.24,3 10.91,3.81 12,5.08C13.09,3.81 14.76,3 16.5,3C19.58,3 22,5.41 22,8.5C22,12.27 18.6,15.36 13.45,20.03L12,21.35Z' fill='currentColor'/>
</svg><span class='sm-none'>Rekomendasi</span></a>
      	<a class='tab-link p-15 cp tab-none flex item-center' data-tab='tab-4'>
          <svg class='mr-8' style='width:24px;height:24px' viewBox='0 0 24 24'>
    <path d='M13,9H11V7H13M13,17H11V11H13M12,2A10,10 0 0,0 2,12A10,10 0 0,0 12,22A10,10 0 0,0 22,12A10,10 0 0,0 12,2Z' fill='currentColor'/>
</svg><span class='sm-none'>Info</span></a>
		<b:include name='navPostRight'/>
    </div>    
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postChapter'>
      <b:include cond='data:view.isHomepage' name='chapterHomeFeed'/>
     <b:include cond='data:view.isSingleItem' name='postChapterBody'/>
      <b:include data='post' name='postMeta'/>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postChapterBody'>
     <data:post.body/> 
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postChapterFeedDivider'>
<h3 class='fs-1 fw-n c-159 ttu app-mt-0 app-pt-20 app-pl-20 app-pr-20'>Update Terkini</h3>    
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postCommentsAndAd' var='post'>
	<b:if cond='data:view.isPost'>
      <div class='oh'>
        <b:with value='data:post.thumbnailUrl ? resizeImage(data:post.thumbnailUrl, 1200, "1:1") : data:post.thumbnail' var='thumb'>
          <img class='w-full h-265-p app-h-210 b60 t-s2' expr:src='data:thumb'/>
        </b:with>
      </div>
	</b:if>
  <article>
   <b:class cond='data:view.isMultipleItems' name='post bg-100spc r4 oh p-10 miv grid-list gtc-48a item-center box-sh bc-213 bsn'/>
    <b:tag class='bg-100 bc-213 app-pl-30 app-pr-30' cond='data:view.isPost' name='div'>
    <b:tag class='grid gta-a1-a4 relative mw-1030 mr-a ml-a gtc-215a gtc-150a gcg-30 gtr-a1f app-gta-md app-gtc-a1fr' cond='data:view.isPost' name='div'>
	<b:if cond='data:view.isMultipleItems'>
      <b:if cond='data:post.thumbnailUrl'>
        
        <div class='relative-th fd-cr i-flex-th r4-c oh-c w-full-c'>
        <a class='i-flex' expr:href='data:post.link ?: data:post.url'>
		<b:with value='data:post.featuredImage.isResizable ? resizeImage(data:post.featuredImage, 265, "185:265") : data:post.thumbnail' var='image'>
		<img alt='gambar' border='0' class='w-48 h-60 ofc r2-l w-185 h-265 w-full-c h-230-c' expr:src='data:image'/>
		</b:with>
		</a>
        <div class='absolute-th bg-overlay w-calc24 p-12 fw-600 dn-l'><b:include data='post' name='postTitle'/></div>
        </div>
        
	</b:if>
      <div class='dn-c gtc-a130list grid-list item-center-l p-y2x16 gg-10 h-full-th grid-th gtr-1fr43'>
        <div class='pr-17 pl-17 pt-17 h-full-th dn-l'>
          <div class='grid gtc-a80 mb-6'>
            <div><div class='c-g800 fs-09 c-173 ls-02'><data:post.lastUpdated.jsonEscaped/></div>
              <div class='fs-08 pt-9 c-139'><b:include name='DbFormat'/>/<b:include name='DbEpisode'/></div></div>
            <div class='c-g800'>
            <div class='flex'>
              <b:include data='{image: data:post.author.authorPhoto.image,imageRatio: "1:1", imageSizes: [84, 168],sourceSizes: "30px",imageClass: "ml-a r50p"}' name='responsiveImage'/>
            </div>
          </div>
          </div>
          <div class='fs-07 c-g600 lh-1d6 ls-02 os max-h100'>
          <b:eval expr='data:post.body        snippet {           length: 250,          links: false,          linebreaks: false }'/>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class='tce pr-17 pl-17 bg-200-th grid item-center bc-101'>
          <div class='dn-th'><b:include data='post' name='postTitle'/></div>
           <b:include cond='data:post.labels' name='postLabels'/>
        </div>
        <div class='dn-th md-none'>
          <b:include data='{image: data:post.author.authorPhoto.image,imageRatio: "1:1", imageSizes: [84, 168],sourceSizes: "30px",imageClass: "r50p"}' name='responsiveImage'/>
        </div>
        <div class='c-g800 fs-09 dn-th c-173 md-none'><b:include name='DbFormat'/>
          <div class='fs-09 c-g600'><b:include name='DbEpisode'/></div></div>
        <time class='c-g800 fs-09 a4 dn-th c-173 md-none' expr:datetime='data:post.date.iso8601' expr:title='data:post.date.iso8601'><data:post.lastUpdated.jsonEscaped/>
        <div class='fs-09 c-g600'><b:include name='DbStatus'/></div>
        </time>
      </div>
    <b:include cond='!data:view.isLabelSearch' data='post' name='postMeta'/>
    </b:if>  
	    <!-- Post title and body -->
      <b:include cond='data:view.isSingleItem' data='post' name='post'/>
    </b:tag>
        <!-- Show ad inside post container, after comments, if single item. -->
    <b:include cond='data:view.isSingleItem and data:post.includeAd' data='post' name='inlineAd'/>
    </b:tag>
    <b:tag class='mw-1030 ml-a mr-a mt-30 grid gtc-215a gcg-30 app-pl-30 app-pr-30' cond='data:view.isPost' name='div'>
      <div class='app-dn'>
     <b:include cond='data:view.isPost' name='postSidebar'/>
      </div>
		<!-- Comments -->
    <b:include cond='data:view.isSingleItem' data='post' name='commentPicker'/>
    </b:tag>
  </article>

  <!-- Show ad outside post container (between posts) for feed pages. -->
  <b:include cond='data:view.isMultipleItems and data:post.includeAd' data='post' name='inlineAd'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postCommentsLink'>
  <b:if cond='data:view.isMultipleItems'>
    <span class='byline post-comment-link container'>
      <b:include cond='data:post.commentSource != 1' name='commentsLink'/>
    </span>
  </b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postFooter' var='post'>
  <div class='post-footer'>
    <b:include name='footerBylines'/>
    <b:include data='post' name='postFooterAuthorProfile'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postFooterAuthorProfile' var='post'>
  <b:if cond='data:post.author.aboutMe and data:view.isPost'>
    <div class='author-profile'>
      <b:if cond='data:post.author.authorPhoto.url'>
        <img class='author-image' expr:src='data:post.author.authorPhoto.url' width='50px'/>
        <div class='author-about'>
          <b:include data='post' name='aboutPostAuthor'/>
        </div>
      <b:else/>
        <b:include data='post' name='aboutPostAuthor'/>
      </b:if>
    </div>
  </b:if>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postHeader' var='post'>
  <b:include name='headerByline'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postJumpLink' var='post'>
  <div class='jump-link flat-button'>
    <a expr:href='data:post.url fragment "more"' expr:title='data:post.title'>
      <b:eval expr='data:blog.jumpLinkMessage'/>
    </a>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postLabels'>
  <span class='lh-2 app-label'>
    <b:class cond='data:view.isSingleItem' name='grid'/>
    <b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
      <b:if cond='data:label.name in ["Action", "Adventure", "Comedy", "Drama", "Ecchi", "Fantasy", "Harem", "Historical", "Horror", "Isekai", "Magic", "Martial Arts", "Mecha", "Mystery", "Psychological", "Reincarnation", "Romance", "Samurai", "School Life", "Sci-Fi", "Seinen", "Shounen", "Slice of Life", "Sport", "Supernatural", "Thriller", "Music", "Demon", "Game", "Josei", "Vampire", "Military"]'>
      <a class='i-block-th' expr:data='data:label.name' expr:href='data:label.url' rel='tag'>
        <b:class cond='data:view.isMultipleItems' name='lh-1d2 p-y0x10 r10 mr-8 ttl fs-08'/>
        <data:label.name/>
      </a>
      </b:if>
    </b:loop>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postLocation'>
  <span class='byline post-location'>
    <data:byline.label/>
    <a expr:href='data:post.location.mapsUrl' target='_blank'><data:post.location.name/></a>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postMeta' var='post'>
  <script type='application/ld+json'> {
	"@context": "http://schema.org",
	"@type": "CreativeWorkSeries",
	"mainEntity": {
		"@type": "BookSeries",
		"name": "<data:post.title/>",
		"alternateName": ["<data:post.title/>"],
		"image": "<b:if cond='data:view.isMultipleItems'><data:post.featuredImage/><b:elseif cond='data:view.isSingleItem'/><data:blog.postImageUrl/></b:if>",
		"description": "Download <data:blog.pageName/> sub indo <data:post.snippets.long/>",
		"startDate": "<data:post.date/>",
		"endDate": "<data:post.lastUpdated.jsonEscaped/>",
		"genre": [<b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>"<data:label.name/>",</b:loop>"Terbaik"],
		"keywords": ["Download", "Baca", "Online", "Manga", "Gratis", "Fansub", "Anime", "Indonesia", "Novel", "Komik", "Lengkap"],
		"aggregateRating": null
	}
} </script>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postMetaBreadcrumb'>
<script type='application/ld+json'>{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
  "itemListElement": [
    {
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": 1,
      "name": "Home",
      "item": "<data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical/>"
    <b:if cond='!data:post.labels'>}<b:else/>},<b:loop index='i' values='data:post.labels' var='label'>
    {
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": <b:with value='data:i + 2' var='num'><b:eval expr='data:num'/></b:with>,
      "name": "<data:label.name/>",
      "item": "<data:label.url.canonical/>"
      <b:if cond='data:post.labels.size != data:i + 1'>},<b:else/>}</b:if></b:loop></b:if>
  ]
}</script>    
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postMetaCat'>
    <script type='application/ld+json'>
    {
      "@context": "http://schema.org",
      "@type": "ItemList",
      "url": "<data:view.url/>",
      "name": "<data:blog.pageTitle/>",
      "description": "<b:include name='genreInfo'/>",
      "itemListElement": [
        <b:loop index='i' values='data:posts' var='post'>{
          "@type": "ListItem",
          "position": <b:with value='data:i + 1' var='num'><b:eval expr='data:num'/></b:with>,
          "url": "<data:post.url/>",
		  "Name": "<data:post.title/>"
        },</b:loop>
        {
          "@type": "ListItem",
          "position": 999,
          "url": "<data:blog.homepageUrl.canonical/>",
		  "Name": "<data:blog.title/>"
        }
      ]
    }
    </script>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postMetadataJSONImage'>
  "image": {
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    <b:if cond='data:post.featuredImage.isResizable'>
    "url": "<b:eval expr='resizeImage(data:post.featuredImage, 1200, "1200:630")'/>",
    "height": 630,
    "width": 1200
    <b:else/>
    "url": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/ULB6iBuCeTVvSjjjU1A-O8e9ZpVba6uvyhtiWRti_rBAs9yMYOFBujxriJRZ-A=w1200",
    "height": 348,
    "width": 1200
    </b:if>
  },
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postMetadataJSONPublisher'>
 "publisher": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Blogger",
    "logo": {
      "@type": "ImageObject",
      "url": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/ULB6iBuCeTVvSjjjU1A-O8e9ZpVba6uvyhtiWRti_rBAs9yMYOFBujxriJRZ-A=h60",
      "width": 206,
      "height": 60
    }
  },
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postPagination'>
  <div class='blog-pager container' id='blog-pager'>
    <b:include cond='data:newerPageUrl' name='previousPageLink'/>
    <b:include cond='data:olderPageUrl' name='nextPageLink'/>
    <b:include cond='data:view.url != data:blog.homepageUrl' name='homePageLink'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postReactions'>
  <span class='byline reactions'>
    <span class='reactions-label'>
      <data:byline.label/>
    </span>
    <iframe allowtransparency='true' class='reactions-iframe' expr:src='data:post.reactionsUrl' frameborder='0' name='reactions' scrolling='no'/>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postShareButtons'>
  <div class='byline post-share-buttons goog-inline-block'>
    <b:with value='data:sharingId ?: ((data:widget.instanceId ?: "sharing") + "-" + (data:regionName ?: "byline") + "-" + data:post.id)' var='sharingId'>
      <!-- Note: 'sharingButtons' includable is from the default Sharing widget markup. -->
      <b:include data='{                                                sharingId: data:sharingId,                                                originalUrl: data:post.url,                                                platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms,                                                shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl,                                                shareTitle: data:post.title,                                              }' name='sharingButtons'/>
    </b:with>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postSidebar'>
      <div>
      <div class='p-15 bg mb-16 r2 bc-213 bg-100'>
      <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Format</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><b:include name='DbFormat'/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15 episode'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Episode</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><b:include name='DbEpisode'/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Status</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><b:include name='DbStatus'/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15 musim'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Musim</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><b:include name='DbMusim'/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Genre</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><b:include name='DbGenre'/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Oleh</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114 flex item-center'><data:post.author.name/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Tanggal Post</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><data:post.date/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>Update Terakhir</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><data:post.lastUpdated.jsonEscaped/></div>
      </div>
        <div class='pb-15'>
        <div class='fs-09 pb-5 c-159'>ID Release</div>
        <div class='fs-08 c-g800 c-114'><data:post.id/></div>
      </div>
      </div>
		<a name='details2'/>
      </div>
    </b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postTimestamp'>
  <span class='byline post-timestamp'>
    <data:byline.label/>
    <b:if cond='data:post.url'>
      <meta expr:content='data:post.url.canonical'/>
      <a class='timestamp-link' expr:href='data:post.url' rel='bookmark' title='permanent link'>
        <time class='published' expr:datetime='data:post.date.iso8601' expr:title='data:post.date.iso8601'>
          <data:post.date/>
        </time>
      </a>
    </b:if>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='postTitle' var='post'>
  <b:if cond='data:post.title != ""'>
    
    <b:if cond='data:view.isPost'>
    <div class='ga-1'>
        <b:with value='data:post.thumbnailUrl ? resizeImage(data:post.thumbnailUrl, 265, "185:265") : data:post.thumbnail' var='thumb'> 
         <img class='ofc mt-n100 box-4 r2 h-305 w-100p app-mxw-100 app-mt-n50' expr:alt='"Download " + data:blog.pageName + " Batch Sub Indo"' expr:src='data:thumb'/>
        </b:with>
    </div>
    </b:if>
    <b:tag class='ga-2 r4-tr' cond='data:view.isPost' name='div'>
    <h1 class='tce'>
      <b:class cond='data:view.isPost' name='fw-n fs-1d3 c-159'/>
      <b:class cond='data:view.isMultipleItems' name='mb-8-l m-0 w-185-c'/>
      <b:class cond='data:view.isPage' name='m-y20x22 fs-1d3 fw-n c-159'/>

      <b:else/>
        <data:post.title/>

    <b:includable id='sharingButton'>
  <span expr:aria-label='data:platform.shareMessage' expr:class='"sharing-platform-button sharing-element-" + data:platform.key' expr:data-href='data:shareUrl + "&target=" + data:platform.target' expr:data-url='data:originalUrl' expr:title='data:platform.shareMessage' role='menuitem' tabindex='-1'>
    <b:include name='sharingPlatformIcon'/>
    <span class='platform-sharing-text'><data:platform.name/></span>
  </span>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='sharingButtonContent'>
  <div class='flat-icon-button ripple'>
    <b:include name='shareIcon'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='sharingButtons'>
  <div class='sharing' expr:aria-owns='"sharing-popup-" + data:sharingId' expr:data-title='data:shareTitle'>
    <button class='sharing-button touch-icon-button' expr:aria-controls='"sharing-popup-" + data:sharingId' expr:aria-label='data:messages.share.escaped' expr:id='"sharing-button-" + data:sharingId' role='button'>
      <b:include name='sharingButtonContent'/>
    </button>
    <b:include name='sharingButtonsMenu'/>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='sharingButtonsMenu'>
  <div class='share-buttons-container'>
    <ul aria-hidden='true' class='share-buttons hidden' expr:aria-label='data:messages.share.escaped' expr:id='"sharing-popup-" + data:sharingId' role='menu'>
      <b:loop values='(data:platforms ?: data:blog.sharing.platforms) filter (p => p.key not in {"blogThis"})' var='platform'>
        <li>
          <b:include name='sharingButton'/>
        </li>
      </b:loop>
      <li aria-hidden='true' class='hidden'>
        <b:include name='otherSharingButton'/>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='sharingPlatformIcon'>
  <b:include data='{ iconClass: ("touch-icon sharing-" + data:platform.key) }' expr:name='data:platform.key + "Icon"'/>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='tabNav'>
	<div class='tab-content' id='tab-2'>
		<b:if cond='data:view.isSingleItem'>
<div id='disqus_thread'/>
<script src='http://code.jquery.com/jquery-latest.js'/><meta content='ID Halaman Facebook' property='fb:admins'/><script type='text/javascript'>function commentToggle(selectTab) {$(".comments-tab").addClass("inactive-select-tab");$(selectTab).removeClass("inactive-select-tab");$(".comments-page").hide();$(selectTab + "-page").show();}</script><style>.comments-page { background-color: #f2f2f2;}#blogger-comments-page { padding: 0px 5px; display: none;}.comments-tab { float: left; padding: 5px; margin-right: 3px; cursor: pointer; background-color: #f2f2f2;}.comments-tab-icon { height: 14px; width: auto; margin-right: 3px;}.comments-tab:hover { background-color: #eeeeee;}.inactive-select-tab { background-color: #d1d1d1;}</style>
</b:if>

	</div>

    <b:includable id='threadedCommentForm' var='post'>
  <div class='comment-form'>
    <a name='comment-form'/>

    <b:if cond='data:this.messages.blogComment != ""'>
      <p class='r4 p-20 bi-blue box-3 c-white'><data:this.messages.blogComment/></p>
    </b:if>
    <b:include data='post' name='commentFormIframeSrc'/>
    <iframe allowtransparency='allowtransparency' class='blogger-iframe-colorize blogger-comment-from-post' expr:height='data:cmtIframeInitialHeight ?: "90px"' frameborder='0' id='comment-editor' name='comment-editor' src='' width='100%'/>
    <data:post.cmtfpIframe/>
    <script type='text/javascript'>
      BLOG_CMT_createIframe('<data:post.appRpcRelayPath/>');
    </script>
  </div>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='threadedCommentJs' var='post'>
  <script async='async' expr:src='data:post.commentSrc' type='text/javascript'/>
  <b:template-script inline='true' name='threaded_comments'/>
  <script type='text/javascript'>
    blogger.widgets.blog.initThreadedComments(
        <data:post.commentJso/>,
        <data:post.commentMsgs/>,
        <data:post.commentConfig/>);
  </script>
</b:includable>
    <b:includable id='threadedComments' var='post'>
        <div>           
        <div class='tab-content current' id='tab-1'>
          <b:include name='downloadList'/>
  <section class='comments threaded' expr:data-embed='data:post.embedCommentForm' expr:data-num-comments='data:post.numberOfComments' id='comments'>
    <a name='comments'/>
<p class='comment-footer'>
      <b:if cond='data:post.allowNewComments'>
        <b:include data='post' name='threadedCommentForm'/>
      <b:else/>
        <data:post.noNewCommentsText/>
      </b:if>
    </p>
    <div class='comments-content'>
      <b:if cond='data:post.embedCommentForm'>
        <b:include data='post' name='threadedCommentJs'/>
      </b:if>
      <div id='comment-holder'>
         <data:post.commentHtml/>
      </div>
    </div>
    <b:if cond='data:showCmtPopup'>
      <div id='comment-popup'>
        <iframe allowtransparency='allowtransparency' frameborder='0' id='comment-actions' name='comment-actions' scrolling='no'>
        </iframe>
      </div>
    </b:if>
  </section>
	</div>
	<b:include name='tabNav'/>
      </div>
</b:includable>
